Company: Stardock Entertainment / Stardock Entertainment

About:
In Stardockâ€™s latest fantasy strategy game, your existence is threatened by the evil Sorcerer King who is hell-bent on ascending to Godhood. The problem is, Godhood comes with the price of your entire worldâ€™s destruction, which is a bit of a bummer.
